00020 
00021 VLNVBox::VLNVBox(QWidget* parent): QGroupBox(tr("Search within:"), parent),
00022                 searchVendors_(this), searchLibraries_(this), searchNames_(this),
00023                 searchVersions_(this), settings_() {
00024 
00025         // set the texts for the check boxes
00026         searchVendors_.setText(tr("search vendors"));
00027         searchLibraries_.setText(tr("search libraries"));
00028         searchNames_.setText(tr("search names"));
00029         searchVersions_.setText(tr("search versions"));
00030 
00031         // set all checkBoxes to checked
00032         searchVendors_.setChecked(true);
00033         searchLibraries_.setChecked(true);
00034         searchNames_.setChecked(true);
00035         searchVersions_.setChecked(true);
00036 
00037         // connect all check boxes to inform if their state is changed
00038         connect(&searchVendors_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00039                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040         connect(&searchLibraries_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00041                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(&searchNames_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00043                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044         connect(&searchVersions_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00045                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00046 
00047         // the layout to manage the layout of the group box
00048         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00049 
00050         // add widgets to layout and set stretch to the bottom so check boxes are
00051         // always aligned to the top of the group box
00052         layout->addWidget(&searchVendors_);
00053         layout->addWidget(&searchLibraries_);
00054         layout->addWidget(&searchNames_);
00055         layout->addWidget(&searchVersions_);
00056         layout->addStretch();
00057 }
00058 
00059 VLNVBox::~VLNVBox() {
00060 }
00061 
00062 void VLNVBox::onCheckStateChanged() {
00063 
00064         // get the current settings from the check boxes
00065         settings_.vendor_ = searchVendors_.isChecked();
00066         settings_.library_ = searchLibraries_.isChecked();
00067         settings_.name_ = searchNames_.isChecked();
00068         settings_.version_ = searchVersions_.isChecked();
00069 
00070         // inform of the change
00071         emit stateChanged(&settings_);
00072 }
